com.bill.java.api.net

Class ApiResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bill.java.api.net.ApiResource
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bill, BillCredit, BillPay, Customer, CustomerBankAccount, CustomerContact, Invoice, InvoicePay, Item, ReceivedPay, RecurringBill, RecurringInvoice, RPConvFee, SentPay, Services, Session, Vendor, VendorBankAccount

    public abstract class ApiResource
extends java.lang.Object
    Class responsible for converting API responses into resource model instances

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static com.google.gson.Gson GSON
      Transforms models to JSON and vice versa.
      static BDCHttpClient httpClient
      Underlying Httpclient, handles making the connection to the API and fetching responses

      • createCollection

        public static <T> java.util.List<T> createCollection(java.lang.String resourceUrl,
                                                     java.lang.Class<T> clazz)
                                              throws BDCException,
                                                     java.io.IOException
        Executes a request to the specified URL and transforms the response into a List of instance of the specified type
        Parameters:
        resourceUrl - the full URL of the target endpoint. Should only ever be for a list of resources
        clazz - the mapping class of the resources being requested
        Returns:
        A list of the specified type
        Throws:
        BDCException - When the response from the API is not a success
        java.io.IOException - when an I/O exception occurs on the underlying request
        See Also:
        create(String, Class)
